SEARCH
Package model

Class Board

java.lang.Object
model.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the game board in the Pipe Mania game, COntains pipelines and logic related to board management

  • Constructor Summary

    Board()
    Create a new Board instance and initialize the board by calling (initBoard())
